code_General.utilities.rights¶

Generic Backend

Silvio Weging 2023

Contains: Service for rights management

Attributes¶

rightsManagement

Classes¶

Rights

Manage the rights for every path.

Module Contents¶

class code_General.utilities.rights.Rights¶

Manage the rights for every path.

rightsDict¶
rightsList = []¶
rightsFile¶
getFile()¶

Serves the file as it is (usually for frontend)

Returns:

File in JSON Format

Return type:

JSON Object

checkIfAllowed(permissions, path)¶

Check if permission is sufficient for that path.

Parameters:

  • permissions ([str]) – Permissions of that user

  • path (Str) – The name of the function (usually handlers)

Returns:

True of permission sufficient, false if not.

Return type:

Bool

checkIfAllowedWithOperation(permissions, path, operation)¶

Check if permission is sufficient for that path and operation.

Parameters:

  • permissions ([str]) – Permissions of that user

  • path (Str) – The name of the function (usually handlers)

  • operation (Str) – Contains the operation (messages, files, …) that should be checked

Returns:

True of permission sufficient, false if not.

Return type:

Bool

getPermissionsNeededForPath(path)¶

Return list of permissions that correspond to the given path

Parameters:

path (str) – path that needs to be checked

Returns:

list of permissions

Return type:

list

getRightsList()¶

Return list of permissions

Returns:

List of permissions

Return type:

list

KISS-backend
